title: Chattanooga Choo Choo
lyrics:
Pardon me boy
Is that the Chattanooga Choo Choo

title: True Colors
lyrics:
I see your true colors
Shining through

title: Drink/Sing
lyrics:
Chattanooga, we are here (x3)
Getting rowdy, drinking beer!

title: Just Can't Get Enough
lyrics:
When I see you, Nooga
I go out of my head

title: All My Ex's Live in Texas
lyrics:
All My Ex's Live in Texas
And Texas is the place I'd dearly love to be

title: John Carrier
lyrics:
He's here. He's there.
He's every, everywhere

title: Zeca Ferraz
lyrics:
Oh, Zeca, you're so fine
You're so fine you blow my mind
